players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Such a shock to lose Charlie so early. We need to figure out who did this quickly. Any ideas or suspicions?"

You: "Bob is lying. He's trying to frame me to protect himself. We need to think carefully about who benefits from this accusation."
Bob: "Consider the timing. I revealed my investigation result before Alice could accuse anyone. If Alice were truly innocent, why wouldn't she have used that time to accuse someone else?"
Diana: "Bob seems convincing, but we should consider all possibilities. If Alice is guilty, why didn't she accuse anyone else? Let's think carefully before voting."
